viewtier.ui
Class AbstractInput

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--viewtier.ui.Component
        |
        +--viewtier.ui.AbstractInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
Input, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, CheckBox, DropDown, Field, FileUpload, ListBox, Menu, Password, RadioButton, Text
public abstract class AbstractInput
extends Component
implements Input

AbstractInput is a base class incorporating functionality common for all input components.

See Also:
Serialized Form
